metadata.Title: CVE-2021-33033 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The Linux kernel before 5.11.14 has a use-after-free in cipso_v4_genopt innet/ipv4/cipso_ipv4.c because the CIPSO and CALIPSO refcounting for the DOIdefinitions is mishandled, aka CID-ad5d07f4a9cd. This leads to writing anarbitrary value.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
